question: In your own words, what are the responsibilities of members of the City Council?
What do you believe are the three most important opportunities your position can champion during your term, and how do you intend to earn community support?
How will you handle conflicts of interest and ethical challenges that may arise while serving as an elected official?

statementA: Citizens should elect me because I will make the best decision I can based on my experience, judgment, and beliefs.
statementB: Citizens should elect me because I will seek out opinions and perspectives different from my own when formulating a decision.

statementA: The city has a role to play in cost of living and affordable housing.
statementB: Cost of living and housing affordability should be left solely to the market.

statementA: The City Council should rely on the private sector to create projects that enhance culture.
statementB: The City Council should help fund major capital projects that enhance the vibrancy of local culture.

statementA: We should control and guide suburban sprawl even if doing so affects short-term economic growth.
statementB: We shouldnâ€™t restrain free market development; it's critical to our local economy.

statementA: The City Council is doing a good job of being transparent.
statementB: The City Council should do a much better job of being transparent.

question: The City Council has a role to play in leading our region to be more welcoming, inclusive, diverse, and equitable.
